Topic.Title: Why is Obama Giving 17 Fighter Jets to the brotherhood?

Message.Msg: Hey robfisk, did you get your mommy to type this for you. Time to change your diaper.

I guess you forgot about your hero Dubya and all the spending he did in his 8 years that caused most of this. 10 years of Dubya's tax cuts that mostly benefited the rich and you are ok with that. Clean your own house first!
Please ricky, no more facts. These reich-wingers hate the truth.

Topic.Title: Why is Obama Giving 17 Fighter Jets to the brotherhood?

Message.Msg: Too bad you don't have access to some grey matter.

Gee, all the time I thought it was the banksters like Goldman-Sax that caused the recession. They were the second largest PAC contributor to the Kenyan's campaign. He rewarded them by appointing their officers to every government post that controls our finances. I'm sure they will do as good a job there as they did creating the housing bubble.

Lew, I am very familiar with the Council on Foreign Relations. They publish Foreign Affairs, the premier academic journal on foreign affairs. It is a top level, non-partisan think tank. Of course Bush and Kerry are both members. So are #$%$ Cheney and Bill Clinton, It is an arena where top level officials often debate and formulate foreign policy or articulate their policies and positions. It's purpose is non-partisan research. I don't know what else to tell you. Your conspiracy theories are pretty ridiculous.

"If you recall the Democrats are the ones that insisted on an end date for the current tax rates." No, winholder. The tax cuts were always temporary, and were passed when Republicans controlled both chambers and the presidency. You can try to make this case all you want. The American people see you as the obstructionists you are and you're done.

"I paid for my own and probably part of yours, you ingrate." No, you did not. You ran up the deficit and expect your children and grandchildren to pay for it. You can talk about the rich and poor all you want. It is peanuts compared to the intergenerational transfer of wealth boomers have forced on their children and grandchildren. Boomers began running up the debt in the early 1980s. They certainly did not plan for the strain their retirements will put on Soc. Sec. and Medicare/Medicaid. Medicare is broke, Soc. Sec will be by the time I retire, and we are running record deficits--not saving. Our debt is approaching 100% of GDP, spending will rise automatically due to boomers collecting Soc. Sec. & Medicare. When you were young and poor you had the greatest safety net this country has ever seen. When you were old and enjoying the highest incomes of your lives you lowered taxes on yourselves. And you still refuse to pay any meaningful portion of what you have lavished on yourselves. Instead you want to cut what? Food stamps? Education? Transportation? How much more do you want to take from future generations? Pay for your stuff, you ingrate.

Topic.Title: Why is Obama Giving 17 Fighter Jets to the brotherhood?

Message.Msg: "You are already delusional" Yet I still don't think an unholy alliance is secretly running the US. Excellent! My plan for more pleasant delusions is working. "will probably be a total nut case" Hopefully I'll think my nursing staff is an unholy alliance between Queen Raina of Jordan and Anna Chapman the Russian spy. In that case, the unholier the alliance the better!
The way I feel today.... I think the ball dropped on my head!

And if I was followed and accosted by an armed stranger in the middle of the night, I may have tried to beat his brains out. Martin had a right to stand his ground as well, did he not? Maybe stand your ground doesn't apply if you stand your ground with your fists instead of a gun? Or maybe it doesn't apply if you're black? You tell me why Zimmerman gets to stand his ground but Martin doesn't. As I see it, Zimmerman had a beating coming to him. You all focus on Martin being a dumb teenager as evidence he probably started the fight. Zimmerman is the one with a history of arrests for violent assaults, not Martin. Maybe that doesn't count if you're white? Or if you're the self-proclaimed good guy with a gun? You are right. As it is, only Zimmerman knows the truth. The one who brought a Kel-Tec PF 9mm semi-automatic pistol to a skittles fight. If he hadn't brought a gun both would have been able to tell their stories. Or, more likely, there would be no story to tell.

I am glad you feel you've been entertained, but you've got this backwards. Me and my buddy Obama wanted this case to go to trial, so the facts could be known. Whatever the outcome of that trial, I will be satisfied. It is the other side that thinks it knows enough to prosecute Martin for assault and sentence him to death. And to allow Zimmerman to be judge, jury and executioner in the case. That is unacceptable.

what I see among these posters generally is people only want to see what they want. They selectively forget specific bills passed under both Bush and Obama that have caused many of this countrys' problems. As a side note, I fail to see why many posters stick up for the republican refusal to raise the tax rate on people making $450,000. I doubt whether any posters here or other boards make that kind of money.

Topic.Title: Might be time for a moment of prayer for the good people of Chicago

Message.Msg: "It’s like the Aurora, CO theater story plus a restaurant!" Except for how its different. The gunman was targeting specific people whom he chased from the restaurant across a parking lot and into a theater. He was armed with a pistol, not a semi-automatic assault rifle. If either of those differences weren't true, this gunman would have killed alot of people. There was also an on-duty uniformed police officer in the parking lot. Yet this gunman managed to shoot people in a restaurant, chase them across the parking lot past the on-duty police officer, into a theater, fire shots in the theater and search a bathroom before being shot when he exited the bathroom. Shots were fired in the restaurant, the parking lot and the theater. So, the statement that he was shot before he had "a chance" to kill anyone simply is not true. He had plenty of chances to kill plenty of people. He simply chose not to kill the available targets or failed to kill the targets he did fire on. He clearly had plenty of chances to kill alot of people. So, what I can gather from this is that every time someone shoots someone with a gun, you people will claim there would have been a massacre except for the armed citizenry present. This particular armed citizen was an off duty police officer, Sgt. Lisa Castellano, with thirteen years experience hired by the theater to provide security. She was not simply "at" the theater.

Jon, I cannot keep people from using an ID similar to my own. You need to learn to tell the difference between myself and my impersonators. Otherwise you will continue to be confused and I am not going to take the time to sort it out for you.

Topic.Title: Communist Reid Fails to Protect USA Constititution

Message.Msg: As a Tea Party Factionado I hope Harry Reid drops dead along with your Illegal Immigrant President.

Topic.Title: They Will Run Up T into the ex-Div Date

Message.Msg: Longer term, their customer service is going to destroy the company. They never fixed our phone line so we bundled telephone with Time Warner Cable after being a customer of T for many years. We know others who canceled phone service for the same reason.
